var _TerracottaService;/**
 * Terracotta Insurance Quote Integration Service
 * 
 * This service handles all communication with the Terracotta Integrated Quote web service
 * using SOAP protocol. It provides methods for:
 * - Requesting quotes (ProvideQuotation)
 * - Updating quotes with additional covers (ProvideQuotationWithAlterations)
 * - Getting screening questions (ScreeningQuestions)
 * - Saving policy details (SavePolicyDetails)
 */// Import xmldom for Node.js XML parsing
let DOMParser;if(typeof window==='undefined'){// Node.js environment
const{DOMParser:XMDOMParser}=require('xmldom');DOMParser=XMDOMParser;}else{// Browser environment
DOMParser=window.DOMParser;}// Terracotta API Configuration
const TERRACOTTA_BASE_URL='https://www.asuaonline.com/ws/integratedquote.asmx';const PROXY_BASE_URL='http://localhost:3001/api/terracotta';const TERRACOTTA_USER_ID='4072';const TERRACOTTA_USER_CODE='111427';// TypeScript interfaces for Terracotta API data structures
/**
 * Helper function to decode HTML entities and format currency
 */function formatCurrencyLimit(htmlString){if(!htmlString)return'';// Decode HTML entities
const textarea=document.createElement('textarea');textarea.innerHTML=htmlString;let decoded=textarea.value;// Additional manual replacements for common entities
decoded=decoded.replace(/€/gi,'‚Ç¨').replace(/£/gi,'¬£').replace(/$/gi,'$').replace(/&/gi,'&').replace(/</gi,'<').replace(/>/gi,'>').replace(/"/gi,'"').replace(/'/gi,"'");// Format numbers with thousand separators
// Match patterns like ‚Ç¨32000 or euro32000 and add commas
decoded=decoded.replace(/([‚Ç¨¬£$]|euro|pound|dollar)?\s*(\d{4,})/gi,(match,currency,number)=>{const formattedNumber=parseInt(number).toLocaleString('en-US');return currency?"".concat(currency).concat(formattedNumber):formattedNumber;});// Fix spacing: "Up to‚Ç¨32,000" -> "Up to ‚Ç¨32,000"
decoded=decoded.replace(/(\w)([‚Ç¨¬£$])/g,'$1 $2');return decoded;}/**
 * SOAP XML Builder utility functions
 */class SOAPBuilder{static createEnvelope(body){return"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
               xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" 
               xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
  <soap:Body>
    ".concat(body,"
  </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>");}static buildTravelerXML(traveler){return"
      <Traveller>
        <TravellerNumber>".concat(traveler.TravellerNumber,"</TravellerNumber>
        <Title>").concat(traveler.Title,"</Title>
        <FirstName>").concat(traveler.FirstName,"</FirstName>
        <LastName>").concat(traveler.LastName,"</LastName>
        <DateOfBirth>").concat(traveler.DateOfBirth,"</DateOfBirth>
        <Age>").concat(traveler.Age,"</Age>
        <AgebandID>").concat(traveler.AgebandID||0,"</AgebandID>
        <TitleID>").concat(traveler.TitleID||0,"</TitleID>
        <minAge>").concat(traveler.minAge||traveler.Age,"</minAge>
        <maxAge>").concat(traveler.maxAge||traveler.Age,"</maxAge>
        <AlterationID>").concat(traveler.AlterationID||'',"</AlterationID>
        <msPrice>").concat(traveler.msPrice||0,"</msPrice>
        <msPriceExcIPT>").concat(traveler.msPriceExcIPT||0,"</msPriceExcIPT>
        <msConditions>").concat(traveler.msConditions||'',"</msConditions>
        <ScreeningInformation xsi:nil="true" />
      </Traveller>");}static buildContactDetailsXML(contact){return"
      <ContactDetails>
        <Address>".concat(contact.Address,"</Address>
        <Postcode>").concat(contact.Postcode,"</Postcode>
        <Email>").concat(contact.Email,"</Email>
        <Telephone>").concat(contact.Telephone,"</Telephone>
        ").concat(contact.VehicleMakeModel?"<VehicleMakeModel>".concat(contact.VehicleMakeModel,"</VehicleMakeModel>"):'',"
        ").concat(contact.VehicleLicensePlate?"<VehicleLicensePlate>".concat(contact.VehicleLicensePlate,"</VehicleLicensePlate>"):'',"
        ").concat(contact.VehicleYearManufacture?"<VehicleYearManufacture>".concat(contact.VehicleYearManufacture,"</VehicleYearManufacture>"):'',"
      </ContactDetails>");}static buildQuoteDetailsXML(details){const travelersXML=details.Travellers.map(traveler=>this.buildTravelerXML(traveler)).join('');const contactXML=this.buildContactDetailsXML(details.ContactDetails);return"
      <quoteDetails>
        <ResidenceID>".concat(parseInt(details.ResidenceID)||1,"</ResidenceID>
        <TypePolicyID>").concat(details.TypePolicyID,"</TypePolicyID>
        <TypePackageID>").concat(parseInt(details.TypePackageID)||1,"</TypePackageID>
        <Destination>").concat(details.Destination,"</Destination>
        <StartDate>").concat(details.StartDate,"</StartDate>
        <EndDate>").concat(details.EndDate,"</EndDate>
        <Travellers>
          ").concat(travelersXML,"
        </Travellers>
        ").concat(contactXML,"
        ").concat(details.includeAnnualQuotes!==undefined?"<includeAnnualQuotes>".concat(details.includeAnnualQuotes,"</includeAnnualQuotes>"):'',"
        ").concat(details.includeUpsell!==undefined?"<includeUpsell>".concat(details.includeUpsell,"</includeUpsell>"):'',"
        ").concat(details.currencyID?"<currencyID>".concat(details.currencyID,"</currencyID>"):'',"
        ").concat(details.schemaIDFilter?"<schemaIDFilter>".concat(details.schemaIDFilter,"</schemaIDFilter>"):'',"
      </quoteDetails>");}static buildScreeningAnswersXML(answers){return'<screeningQuestionAnswers>'+answers.map(answer=>"
        <screeningQuestionAnswer>
          <questionNumber>".concat(answer.questionNumber,"</questionNumber>
          <answer>").concat(answer.answer,"</answer>
        </screeningQuestionAnswer>")).join('')+'</screeningQuestionAnswers>';}static buildEligibilityAnswersXML(answers){return'<EligibilityQuestionAnswers>'+answers.map(answer=>"
        <eligibilityQuestionAnswer>
          <questionNumber>".concat(answer.questionNumber,"</questionNumber>
          <answer>").concat(answer.answer,"</answer>
        </eligibilityQuestionAnswer>")).join('')+'</EligibilityQuestionAnswers>';}static buildDynamicDetailsXML(details){return'<DynamicDetails>'+details.map(detail=>"
        <DynamicDetail_SavedValue>
          <Position>".concat(detail.Position,"</Position>
          <FieldName>").concat(detail.FieldName,"</FieldName>
          <FieldValue>").concat(detail.FieldValue,"</FieldValue>
          <FieldSize>").concat(detail.FieldSize,"</FieldSize>
        </DynamicDetail_SavedValue>")).join('')+'</DynamicDetails>';}static buildSpecificQuoteDetailsXML(details){const travelersXML=details.Travellers.map(traveler=>this.buildTravelerXML(traveler)).join('');const contactXML=this.buildContactDetailsXML(details.ContactDetails);const dynamicDetailsXML=details.DynamicDetails?this.buildDynamicDetailsXML(details.DynamicDetails):'';const screeningAnswersXML=details.screeningQuestionAnswers?this.buildScreeningAnswersXML(details.screeningQuestionAnswers):'';const eligibilityAnswersXML=details.EligibilityQuestionAnswers?this.buildEligibilityAnswersXML(details.EligibilityQuestionAnswers):'';return"
      <specificQuoteDetails>
        <AlterationID>".concat(details.AlterationID,"</AlterationID>
        <Travellers>
          ").concat(travelersXML,"
        </Travellers>
        ").concat(contactXML,"
        ").concat(dynamicDetailsXML,"
        ").concat(screeningAnswersXML,"
        ").concat(eligibilityAnswersXML,"
      </specificQuoteDetails>");}}/**

return"".concat(birthYear,"/01/01");}function calculateAgeFromDateOfBirth(dateOfBirth){const birthDate=new Date(dateOfBirth);const today=new Date();let age=today.getFullYear()-birthDate.getFullYear();const monthDiff=today.getMonth()-birthDate.getMonth();if(monthDiff<0||monthDiff===0&&today.getDate()<birthDate.getDate()){age--;}return Math.max(0,age);}function getResidenceID(country){// Map countries to Terracotta Residence IDs

};return policyMap[tripType]||'2';// Default to Single Trip TypePolicyID
